data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=louBCBO0cdoQ7kNvgH6sSMX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDRKA1FExDn75gGdW97BuRXsX3CHHkD27zye5T91AtYLQ&oe=66EEAC37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gu3GqOGBBrEQ7kNvgEtcyAS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD5xwJiMgPmtKjncD9P6cLK5EcdZ7OsmJa721ZssTDayg&oe=66EEB9D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=v_L3g1MwH5gQ7kNvgFE0O09&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBd6S2HjR7qFdMx-NLp9iIvHl6kDRKe8ix8sBT_7YD8mg&oe=66EEA509)
